sentences.english: Group of Liver, Chinese Society of Surgery, Chines.
sentences.chinese: 中華醫學會外科學分會肝臟學組。

sentences.english: The above datas provides anatomical evidence for microsurgery and interventional radiology.
sentences.chinese: 研究數據爲顯微外科學和介入放射學提供解剖學依據。

sentences.english: Surgery of integrated Chinese and Western medicine is a clinical discipline that attaches great importance to practice.
sentences.chinese: 中西醫結合外科學是一門實踐性極強的臨牀學科。

sentences.english: While after renaissance time, modern surgery in western medicine has been largely improved by its technologies.
sentences.chinese: “文藝復興”以後的西醫外科學得到突飛猛進地發展。

sentences.english: The surgeon had saved many lives by surgery.
sentences.chinese: 這名外科醫生運用外科學救了很多人。

sentences.english: Surgery learns " of graduate assessment " the real thing.
sentences.chinese: 外科學畢業生的考覈“真刀實槍”。

sentences.english: His grandfather was one of the pioneers of heart surgery.
sentences.chinese: 他的祖父是心臟外科學的先驅之一。
